changes.description: Prevent ReferenceError by renaming 'file' variable and adding robust null/type checks when opening files. Improves logging and user feedback.
Initialize password field visibility based on current auth method at startup for better UX.

patches.replacement:
// Initialize visibility immediately on load as well
  { const sel = qs('#authMethod'); const group = qs('#passwordGroup'); if (sel && group) group.classList.toggle('hidden', sel.value !== 'password'); }
